name: Admin Console UI
description: Frontend client for the Salsify admin section found at app.salsify.com/admin. Split out from the dandelion monolith repo. Provides administrative interfaces for managing organizations, users, OAuth applications, tokens, audits, config manifests, target schemas, and superuser management. Uses GraphQL to communicate with multiple backend services including dandelion, audits, config-manifests, and the unified-admin graph.

name: Dandelion
description: The main Salsify monolith repository containing the core backend application. The admin-console-ui was originally part of this repo before being split out. Runs locally on port 5000 and serves the admin GraphQL endpoint at /admin/graphql.

name: Unified Admin Graph
description: A unified GraphQL schema for admin operations powered by the GraphQL Gateway. Unlike other admin GraphQL endpoints, it does not support local development and schema updates are pulled from production. Accessed via app.salsify.com/unified/admin/graphql with a superuser access token.

name: Superuser
description: An elevated administrative role in Salsify with access to the admin console at app.salsify.com/admin. Superusers can manage organizations, users, tokens, and other administrative functions. Authentication can be done via Google SSO, and superuser access tokens are managed at app.salsify.com/admin/tokens.

name: Config Manifests
description: A Salsify service for managing configuration manifests, accessible via the admin console. Runs locally on port 21046 and provides a GraphQL endpoint at /admin/graphql for administrative operations.

name: Audits Service
description: A Salsify backend service for audit logging and tracking, accessible via the admin console. Runs locally on port 21030 and provides a GraphQL endpoint at /admin/graphql for querying audit data.
